Title: GeoNature
NotAllowed: You do not have the rights to perform this action
DownloadOverflow: The number of items is too big to be downloaded, please modify your request or contact your administrator

MapList.NoColumnSelected: Please select a column to filter

MetaData.NoJDD: No dataset found, contact your administrator
MetaData.NoJDDMTD: No dataset found, first go to the MTD application

Map.FileLayerInfoMessage: Right click on the shape to select your current releve. Selected layer is in red. Right click to display the layer info
Map.FileLayerInfoSynthese: Right click on the shape to display info

Releve.AddTaxonOnReleve: Add a taxon to this releve

Errors.DateMaxError: Max date can't be inferior to the min date
Errors.AltitudeError: Altitude max cannot be smaller than altitude min
Errors.DepthError: Depth min cannot be smaller than depth min
Errors.HourMaxError: End hour can't be inferior to start hour

Taxon.CurrentlyEditing: Please first validate the currently editing taxon
Taxon.NoTaxonFound: No taxon found for this search

Errors.ExistProofValidation: This field must begin with 'http://', 'https://', ou 'ftp://'
Errors.NoExistProofError: If existence proof is 'YES' one of two proof fields must be filled
Errors.ExistproofError: The existence proof can be filled only if exist proof is true

Errors.CountError: Max counting can't be inferior to min counting

IntroMessage: Welcome in CONTACT module. It allows to record observations based on SINP Taxon Occurrencies standard.

Synthese.NoGeomMessage: Some observation(s) could not be displayed on the map because their aggregation mesh is not available.
Synthese.BlurredSensitiveObsMessage:
Warning: the results of your query contain data blurred by sensitivity. Their location will be degraded if you have not requested access to this data.

In this case, in the downloadable observations file, the location of this data will be indicated as “approximate” (fields floutage_dee).

To request access to this data, complete the available access request form (the conditions required to request access are recalled on the form).

AutoAccountEmailConfirmation: An email has been sent to confirm your account
AdminAccountEmailConfirmation: Your demand has been saved, an administrator will answer to you soon
PasswordAndLoginRecovery: An email has been sent to recover your login and password

accessRequest.formTitle: Request for access to precise data
accessRequest.regularFormIntro: Please indicate below the geographic areas for which you want to access the data to its maximum precision. Please also specify the taxonomic groups concerned and the timetable for your study.
accessRequest.geoAreaTooltip: Enter the first letters of a geographical area in the field. Select the item that suits you from the list offered with the directional keys and validate your selection with the “Enter” key.
accessRequest.taxaTooltip: Enter the first letters of a name of a taxonomic group higher than the species rank in the field. Select the item that suits you from the list offered with the directional keys and validate your selection with the “Enter” key.
accessRequest.sensitiveAccessText: I want to access sensitive observations
accessRequest.sensitiveAccessRules: Please consult the rules for access to sensitive data beforehand
accessRequest.responseOk: Your request has been taken into account. It will be evaluated by an administrator.
accessRequest.responseError: An error occurred while taking your request into account.
accessRequest.conventionCanceled: The acceptance of the convention has just been canceled.
accessRequest.acceptOk: Acceptance of the request taken into account
accessRequest.acceptKo: An error occurred while accepting the request: {{error}}
accessRequest.refusalOk: Refusal of the request taken into account
accessRequest.refusalKo: An error occurred while denying the request: {{error}}
accessRequest.pendingKo: An error occurred while putting on hold the request: {{error}}

tooltips.SCOPE: Permission limited by the type of data membership.
tooltips.PRECISION: Activates (= fuzzy) or deactivates (= exact) the blurring of data (sensitive or private).

Permissions.deleteOk: Deleting of the permission taken into account
Permissions.deleteKo: An error occurred while deleting the permission : {{errorMsg}}

filter.atLeastOneFieldMsg: At least one filter field has to be provided. The property filter is mandatory.

validating.endDateTooltip: Format for end date of permission: dd/mm/yyyy.
validating.endDateHelp: Peek a date or leave blank to make the permission permanent.

Permissions.addingKo: An error occured while adding the permission: {{errorMsg}}.
Permissions.updatingKo: An error occured while updatind the permission: {{errorMsg}}.
